model.gameoflife.boards

Class DynamicBoard

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.gameoflife.boards.Board
      • model.gameoflife.boards.DynamicBoard

  • public class DynamicBoard
extends Board
    This is our implementation of an expanding and shrinking dynamic game board for Game Of Life
    See Also:
    Board, Board.BoardType, FixedBoard, Algorithm, MetaData

      • insideArrayBoundaries

        private boolean insideArrayBoundaries(int row,
                                      int column)
        This method checks if a given position is inside the array. If not, the array will be expanded to fit the given positions.
        Parameters:
        row - The specified row position
        column - The specified column position
        Returns:
        true if the specified positions is inside the array, else false

      • setCellAliveState

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
        row - The specified row position
        column - The specified column position
        aliveState - 0 or 1 to represent dead or alive cell
